a.n: My Girlfriends Mother 6: Chloe Foster & James Deen

p.k: Robbie dreaded meeting his girlfriend's mother, but when he finally does, he's taken back as how friendly, alluring and sensual she really is. When she finally reveals that her daughter has not been totally honest in their relationship, he suddenly gives in to his urges and goes after the mother. Starring Julia Ann and Chloe Foster with Logan Pierce and James Deen. Introduction new teen cutie, Veronica Radke.
